name: Microgarden (Maytch, Zugai89)
description:
Welcome to Microgarden!

The objective is to place plants on to the table and keep their health high by using items and optimal placement. Pick one of the three objects available. Aim to get a high score!

Plants are affected by Light and Humidity. Plants and items may also reduce the light of adjacent plants.

Plants start dying if they dip below 50% health. Try to match the target Light and Humidity shown as the green bars in the information window when selecting a plant.

Controls:

  • W A S D - Camera Movement
  • Q + E - Camera Rotation
  • Mouse Scroll - Zoom Camera
  • Mouse Left Click - Interact
  • R - Item / Plant rotation
Leave a comment with your Table + High Score!
